content.description: Densely packed (~20ft tall) red dirt cliff containing heavy deposits of clay, suitable for dry tooling, along the Spring Creek Greenway. Multiple trees along the ledge, East of the overlook, in ideal spots for setting top rope anchors. Cliff face gets progressively steeper (ranging from M1-M4) as you travel East along the creek. Watch the weather, as the creek bed becomes flooded (sometimes for days) after rain, restricting access from the Spring Creek Greenway Trail.
